title: (1 Peter - Part 17): Seeing Ye Have Purified Your Souls
description: “Seeing Ye Have Purified Your Souls” is part 17 of Pastor A. W. Tozer’s delightful, 34-part series based upon 1 Peter. The message was preached in Chicago, Illinois on January 17, 1954. Pastor Tozer notes that 1 Peter 1:22 is perfect for a sermon, as it may be conveniently divided into 7 parts: 1) You have purified your souls; 2) By obeying the truth; 3) Through the Spirit; 4) Unto unfeigned love of the brethren; 5) See therefore that ye love one another; 6) Out of a pure heart; 7) Fervently. He also teaches quick but important refresher courses in homiletics, comparative religion, and apologetics (from Hebrews 11.) The length of the recording is 31 minutes and 36 seconds.

title: Take Away The Stone
description: Just as Jesus needed to "take away the stone" to revive Lazarus, He also wants to help us remove the stones from our life that keep us from being all God desires us to be. John 11:21-27, 38-44
